sections.introduction: I am a front-end developer passionate about learning while creating robust well-finished products.

summary.title: Career Summary
items: 10+ years of professional experience in software engineering.
Mainly in e-commerce markets. Vast experience working with geo distributed teams.
analysis and quality for software development.
Comfortable on communicating with clients on regular basis.
Comfortable also with the use of Agile methodologies.
I had worked with high traffic websites using SOA architectures mostly

items.title: HTML/CSS
items.skills: HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Less, Responsive Web Design, Bootstrap, Styled-Components, CSS in JS

items.title: Javascript
items.skills: React, Angular, Redux, Redux-Saga, Webpack, Grunt, Gulp

items.name: Elementum
items.position: Front End Web Developer for UI interface on Data Acquisitions Management team.
items.technology: ReactJS, Webpack, Redux, Redux-Saga, Lodash, Jest/Enzyme, ESLint for readable code.
items.description: Create a React “Single Page Application” Portal for managing clients sensible (Starbucks, OSI Group, Philips, Flex) data right from scratch. The Portal enables the user to upload spreadsheet files that are uploaded to an S3 bucket from Amazon and gets processed by the back-end services. Then returns a feedback file which enables the client to have clear view of the processed results and also enables the user to see the data and the progress of the data processed. For this project I worked on the web interface, app design architecture and usability.

items.name: Deloitte
items.position: Senior Front End Web Developer for Deloitte.
items.description: Development for a punctual project called “Rmss” (Resource Management Staff Setup). Tool for managing resources, adding skills for resources, etc.

items.name: Thomas Cook
items.position: Senior Front End Web Developer for Thomas Cook.
items.description: Development for the global page of Thomas Cook (thomascook.com). Lets the user to book flights, hotels, etc. all over Europe

items.name: Thomas Cook
items.position: Senior Front End Web Developer for Thomas Cook CMS.
items.technology: Angular (1.5), Lodash/Underscore, Karma/Jasmine, Node JS, Magnolia CMS
items.description: Development for a Customized Magnolia CMS used by Product Owners of Thomas Cook that lets users adding content to the dynamic pages of the global site (thomascook.com)

items.name: Walt Disney Parks and Resorts
items.position: Senior Web Developer for Disney Cruise Line.
items.description: Development of the renewed e-commerce site for placing cruise reservations with Disney’s Cruise Line assuring best coding practices and also giving assistance to any newcomer to the project.

items.name: Walt Disney Parks and Resorts
items.position: Senior Web Developer for Disney Cruise Line.
items.description: Development of the renewed e-commerce site for placing cruise reservations with Disney’s Cruise Line assuring best coding practices and also giving assistance to any newcomer to the project.

items.description: Development of the also renewed e-commerce site for applying to the Disney Visa Credit Card.

items.name: Walt Disney Parks and Resorts

items.description: Development of the also renewed e-commerce site for applying to the Disney Visa Credit Card.

items.name: Walt Disney Parks and Resorts

items.description: Development of the Plan and Share your Disney Vacation Itinerary.

items.description: Development of the Disney Online Check In service that lets the user prepare the checking to any Disney Resort before arriving.

items.name: Gameloft

information.title: Additional Information
items: I have an 11 year old daughter called Alma.
I play the guitar and sing when I can.
